column2: "I know you're busy, but would it be such a bad idea to review your equipment once in a while?"
"Armor units are items that you equip once and really just leave as is. Oh? You don't think so?"
"I'm probably the only one who doesn't review it, but I think it'd help if you did, so I'm asking you."
"Alright, then see what you can do."
"Received Rear/Berwyn a, Arm/Berchesta a and Leg/Bersize a from Afin."
